title: 【转】鬼畜活塞，服主噩梦
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/18plsu/more_people_need_to_see_this_this_is_not_my_idea/

不知火星与否，自觉有意思就发出来让没见过的人乐乐……

replies.author: osborn2008
replies.txt_content: 好好玩的樣子。。。試一把去。。。~

replies.author: oWee
replies.txt_content: 卧槽，这个东西碉堡了呀~

replies.author: abbccc
replies.txt_content: 活塞虫？我在某人的视频上貌似见过  可以做定时tnt

replies.author: xieshuxuan
replies.txt_content: 活塞对打机器人，哪个机器人被推到最后谁就死亡。。

replies.author: zhouyiran2
replies.txt_content: 服务器禁止高频红石（当然是服务器先卡机，最好卡到地图爆{:10_521:}）这个应该叫小学生的未来

replies.author: jianghr
replies.txt_content:
测试失败，版本12w49a（给你找shift+右键的版本）。
